name: Haydenwoffle (PROTOTYPE)
description:
Spring Enterprises and VinsCool present Haydenwoffle, their submission for Fall all-OGA game jam 2018.

Disclaimer: This game is currently unbeatable. No matter what you do, there is no way to board the S.S. Hekhmemmut, and neither any way to escape from it.

The game is right now in a very early prototype stage, featuring a loveable mishmash of half-assed and unfinished ideas, extremely short game length, a cliche plotline, mediocre gameplay, atari-level graphics and a killer soundtrack.  It will probably not be developed past this point, and it was only submitted so we at least had something for the jam :p

It's very apparent that we put far the most effort and energy into the music
